entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. POP 70%
